problem.markdown:
1. Kozeny Carman equation is valid for -------- flow conditions in packedbed
() both laminar and turbulent () turbulent (x) laminar
2. Pressure drop in packed bed ------------- with the increase in superficial velocity?
() no effect of superficial velocity on pressure drop () decreases (x) increases
3. Stokes’ law is valid (strictly theoretically) when particle Reynolds number is NRe,p is
() none of the foregoing. (x) much less than one () equal to one () much greater than one
4. For particle Reynolds number above 1000, for packed bed --------------- forces control?
() viscous (x) inertial
5. Under highly turbulent conditions , the modified friction factor for packed bed approaches a value of
() 150 () 1 (x) 1.75 () 5
problem.p: 1. Kozeny Carman equation is valid for -------- flow conditions in packedbed
2. Pressure drop in packed bed ------------- with the increase in superficial velocity?

choicegroup.choice: no effect of superficial velocity on pressure drop

problem.p: 3. Stokes’ law is valid (strictly theoretically) when particle Reynolds number is NRe,p is
4. For particle Reynolds number above 1000, for packed bed --------------- forces control?
